name: MAZE ADVENTURE! (Demo)
description:
You are trapped in an infernal maze, filled with all sorts of different types of traps, tricks, and everything in between. And this demo version of the game you’ll get to see some of the main features of the full game, but if you want to know what the full game will be like you just have to wait.  there are no two different types of demos to try out one which is the old version of the game and the second which is the newer demo.

This is a game for the play date console
